alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 8:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garland and Hot Spring Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 816 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lofton, or 10 miles southwest of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Malvern... Rockport... Perla... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Lofton... Rockwell... Donaldson... Friendship... Bismarck... Magnet Cove... Red Oak... Social Hill... Sunshine... Gifford... De Roche... Lake Catherine State Park... Pettyview... Hempwallace... Pearcy... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas.
